summary: A diffusion-based pipeline that performs pixel-level image editing by transforming input images according to textual instructions, leveraging a pretrained VAE, CLIP text encoder, conditional UNet, and various schedulers, with optional safety checking of generated content.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to integrate advanced, text-guided image manipulation into applications such as photo retouching, visual effects, advertising, and personalized media generation while ensuring compliance with safety standards.
